entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 04:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: S 28 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Wind south 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
